item.title: Google Plans to Roll Out Its A.I. Chatbot to Children Under 13 - The New York Times
item.description:
1. Google Plans to Roll Out Its A.I. Chatbot to Children Under 13  The New York Times
  2. Google will soon start letting kids under 13 use its Gemini chatbot  TechCrunch
  3. My son is going to be so excited that Gemini will soon be available on his phone  Chrome Unboxed
  4. Kids under 13 will soon get supervised access to Google Gemini  Engadget
  5. Google Is Adding Gemini AI to Your Kid's Account, but You Can Turn It Off  Lifehacker
